revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Dreamyard |image = [[File:Dreamyard.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Dreamyard. |tokens = 356,500 |location = Between Unova Route 2 & 3 }} '''Dreamyard''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Unova]]. It initially has 81 tiles arranged in an 9x9 square, including 9 chest tiles, 21 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 5,203,000 HP.
==Encounter Tables== <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Raticate.png|40px]] Raticate || [[File:Psychic_(male).png|30px]] Psychic Nandor || [[File:Hypno.png|40px]] Hypno, [[File:Dusclops.png|40px]] Dusclops |- | [[File:Jigglypuff.png|40px]] Jigglypuff || [[File:Scientist_(female).png|40px]] Scientist Athena || [[File:Gastly.png|40px]] Gastly, [[File:Skuntank.png|40px]] Skuntank |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat || [[File:Psychic_(female).png|40px]] Psychic Olesia || [[File:Chingling.png|40px]] Chingling, [[File:Mr._Mime.png|40px]] Mr. Mime |- | [[File:Watchog.png|40px]] Watchog || [[File:Scientist_(male).png|40px]] Scientist Franklin || [[File:Klang.png|40px]] Klang, [[File:Porygon.png|40px]] Porygon |- | [[File:Liepard.png|40px]] Liepard || [[File:School_Kid_(male).png|40px]] School Kid William || [[File:Shroomish.png|40px]] Shroomish, [[File:Tangrowth.png|40px]] Tangrowth |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Munna.png|40px]] Munna || [[File:Youngster.png|40px]] Youngster Keita || [[File:Slakoth.png|40px]] Slakoth, [[File:Slaking.png|40px]] Slaking |- | [[File:School_Kid_(female).png|40px]] School Kid Rita || [[File:Igglybuff.png|30px]] Igglybuff, [[File:Lickilicky.png|40px]] Lickilicky |}
